name: Jie Xue
tagline: Brevity is the Soul of Wit
body:
### Welcome to Jie Xue's Homepage
[Jie Xue](https://www.linkedin.com/in/xue-jie-2b3633b2/en), Ph.D in Electronic Engineering(Expected In fall 2016),  Java programmer 

Contact: jiexue328 (AT)gmail (DOT)com


### Who is Jie Xue
• I am a well-trained PhD level **Electrical and Computer Engineer**, with solid project management
and quantitative analysis background; Specialized in **process control**, **optimization**, and **statistic
analysis**.

• I have strong coding, modeling, and testing background. Hands-on experience in R, JAVA and MAT-
LAB; **JAVA Programmer with a certificate**.

• I am very passion for tracking **big data** challenges by **Machine Learning** theory and methods, especially
interested in using algorithms as map reducing, Hadoop, support vector machine.

### Recent News of Jie Xue

**I am now close to graduate, so I am actively looking for 

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vectormars/jiexue/gh-pages/images/lookingjob.png)
### Education
* PhD in Electrical and Computer Engineer at [Purdue University](http://www.purdue.edu/)

* Master in Electronic and Computer Engineer [Indiana University-Purdue University at Indianapolis](https://www.iupui.edu/)

* Bachelor in Automatic Control and Electronic Engineering at [Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics](http://www.nuaa.edu.cn/nuaanew/)

### Current Status of Jie 
I am now a full time PhD student, but also work as **Research Engineer for Intelligent Systems and Controls Laboratory**, in [Purdue University](http://www.purdue.edu/)
